article_title: Have We Created a Two-Tiered Tax System -- One for the Powerful and One for the Rest of Us?

article_metadata.description: Unlike the rest of us, many high-income, influential people and organizations have close to a free hand when it comes to their taxes. Already underfunded and understaffed, the IRS seems incapable of stopping many aggressive or even abusive interpretations of the tax laws, often by hedge funds or politically-motivated tax-exempt [...]
